abstract: Russia summons Turkish military attache to discuss actions by Turkish fishing boat that resulted in Russian warship firing warning shots at boat in Aegean Sea; action portents potential consequences should Turkey take action against Russian military campaign in Syria.
lead_paragraph: A Russian warship fired warning shots after the Turkish vessel sailed within 1,600 feet of it, Russia’s Defense Ministry said, increasing tensions between the two countries.

headline.main: Run-In With Turkish Fishing Boat Angers Russian Military
headline.print_headline: Run-In With Turkish Fishing Boat Angers Russian Military

snippet: A Russian warship fired warning shots after the Turkish vessel sailed within 1,600 feet of it, Russia’s Defense Ministry said, increasing tensions between the two countries.
